name: Cube Runner (itch) (ExVainz)
description:
Cube Runner is a 3D endless running game that can be enjoyed offline, anytime! This is a single player game. In this game, you become a cube that is trying to run away from a circle that is come to you and avoid the existing obstacles as long as you can.

Features:

  • Collect Coins & Diamonds
  • Shop
  • Multiple Environment
  • Achievements
  • Powerups

Members:

  • Vito Sebastian Sanjaya as Project Manager & Game Designer
  • Nicholas Tandinata as Game Programmer
  • Robertus Eric as 3D Artist
  • Valent Ruben Setiawan as Game Designer
